apps.localizedDescription:
uYouPlus is a modified version of uYou with some extra features! (requires iOS 18.0 and later).

Full infomation about uYouPlus (uYou+) is available on my Github: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus/

Credits: Please keep the Credits if you re-up uYouPlus! 
https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus#credits

Attention:
- If you like the app, considering support the developers!
- YTUHD is not stable atm. You might encounter stuttering, heat, battery drain..., especially when playing at 2160p (4K) quality. However, this should not happen if you use TrollStore.
- Unless you're using TrollStore, deep-link (aka Open in the YouTube App) simply will not work.

Known issues:
- uYou's issues: https://github.com/MiRO92/uYou-for-YouTube/issues
- uYouPlus's issues: https://github.com/qnblackcat/uYouPlus

apps.localizedDescription:
Adds new features to YouTube:

â€¢ Download and save videos up to 4k resolution
â€¢ Save videos as audio only
â€¢ View, manage and share all your downloads in Cercube's download manager
â€¢ Block ads
â€¢ Share downloaded videos with other devices via AirDrop
â€¢ Background playback for streamed and downloaded videos
â€¢ Import downloads to Music or Videos
â€¢ Play YouTube videos using Picture-in-Picture mode
â€¢ Downloaded videos are displayed within a beautifully crafted downloads manager that shows all the available information
â€¢ Choose the default tab to open when launching YouTube
â€¢ Stream videos in HD on cellular network
â€¢ Auto-replay videos
â€¢ Hide floating upload button
â€¢ Hide the Trending tab
â€¢ Rewind or forward videos
â€¢ Cercube options are configurable from within YouTube settings
â€¢ Play in high quality on Mobile Data

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you upload videos you've already created.
This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium.
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ essentially activates spotify premium on your device with one exception: No downloads.

So what does Spotify++ change?

â€¢ All kinds of ads removed
â€¢ Unlimited skips
â€¢ Play any song or album
â€¢ Enable extreme streaming quality
â€¢ No forced shuffle
â€¢ Import songs from the Music app

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.
Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

news.title: uYouPlus for YouTube
